titles: Two treatises the first of death, on I Cor. 15:26, the second of judgment on 2 Cor. 5:10, 11 / by Rich. Baxter.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. Treatise of death.
notes: Each treatise has special t.p. and separate paging.
